description: The KÜHL BURR™ Men's Lined Jacket delivers the durability and versatility you need when it comes to rugged outdoor performance. The super tough, 100% cotton weave exterior combines with a quilted interior lining and Berber fleece accents for superior warmth, comfort, and style. Articulated sleeves deliver superior range of motion for this jacket built to last a lifetime.
name: Kuhl Burr Jacket Lined - Mens
